job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pSmith Hanley AssociatesppMachine Learning EngineerppAustin TX areappBase salary 60000  80000 depending on experienceppbrppLeading edge company is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to develop data sets and build and test models The role will involve procuring and cleaning data from a variety of sources including from sensors labs modeling software and more You will prototype algorithms evaluate neural networks for computer vision tasks debug scripts assist in software development utilizing python and C produce research and present work Use your deep experience in data modeling and analysis in this challenging and high visibility rolenbspnbspppbrppNote No visas or OPT candidates will be processed at this timeppbrppRequirements of the Machine Learning EngineerppbrppProficiency with multiple machine learning techniques including deep learning kmeans clustering Bayesian classifiers and treebased modelsppProficiency using Python C MatlabppExperience using Tensorflow or PyTorch to train and tune machine learning modelsppExperience producing production quality codeppExpertise with linear systems graph theory probability and statisticsppMinimum 12 years of solid experience in a professional environmentppMinimum Bachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering Statistics Mathematics or other quantitative discipline Masters degree preferredppAbility to work with a variety of platformsnbspppbrppIf this job isnt for you see our other open positions at wwwjobssmithhanleycomnbspppbrppSmith Hanley Associates takes pride in being the premier recruiting agency serving the marketing analytics industry For more information please visit our website at wwwsmithhanleycomp
